DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ultrasound-guided nerve block simulator effective training axillary block technique .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Nerve Block Simulator Training Axillary Blocks
DOC.detailed_description: Ultrasound-guided nerve block become standard care patient require regional anesthesia . Cost-effective training need implementation technique global anesthesia practice . Existing simulator expensive available low income country . The investigator aim test inexpensive simulator training technique .
DOC.criteria: Anesthesia resident Previous train regional anesthesia technique
